processReifIdsForTaxon

private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> processReifIdsForTaxon(java.lang.String oneOrMoreReifIds)
A helper method to handle reif ids coming through for the taxa. It parses a comma delimited list of reif ids and puts them into a set

Parameters:
oneOrMoreReifIds -
Returns:
consolidated reif ids in a comma delimited set

Returns:
- a two member list comprising the final query and the search term for the query

generateTreeBasedDataStructureFromAssertions

private java.util.Map<NodeDTO,java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> generateTreeBasedDataStructureFromAssertions(java.util.Map<NodeDTO,java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> taxonToAssertionsMap,
                                                                                                                             java.util.Collection<PhenotypeDTO> phenotypeColl)
                                                                                                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                             org.bbop.dataadapter.DataAdapterException,
                                                                                                                             PhenoscapeTreeAssemblyException
PURPOSE This method uses an input collection of taxon to phenotype assertions to create a data structure, which is passed to the calling getAnnotations() method

Parameters:
taxonToAssertionsMap - - the data structure to be updated
phenotypeColl - - the input set of taxon to phenotype assertions
Returns:
- the input data structure after updates from the input set of taxon to phenotype assertions
Throws:
java.io.IOException
org.bbop.dataadapter.DataAdapterException
PhenoscapeTreeAssemblyException

processChildrenOfGroupNodeFromInput

private java.util.Map<NodeDTO,java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> processChildrenOfGroupNodeFromInput(java.util.Map<NodeDTO,java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> taxonToAssertionsMap)
                                                                                                             throws PhenoscapeTreeAssemblyException
This is a helper method that processes the annotations from the tree and returns them to calling generateTreeBasedDataStructureFromAssertions(Map, Collection) method

Parameters:
taxonToAssertionsMap - - the node to assertions map to be processed
Returns:
the processed node to assertions map
Throws:
PhenoscapeTreeAssemblyException

generateSimpleDataStructureFromAssertions

private java.util.Map<NodeDTO,java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> generateSimpleDataStructureFromAssertions(java.util.Map<NodeDTO,java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> taxonToAssertionsMap,
                                                                                                                          java.util.Collection<PhenotypeDTO> phenotypeColl)
This method generates a simple Taxon to List of Phenotypes map from the input taxon to phenotype assertions, which is passed to the calling getAnnotations() method

Parameters:
taxonToAssertionsMap - - the map from taxa to phenotype assertions
phenotypeColl - - the input collection of taxon to phenotype assertions
Returns:
a data structure containing all the assertions

filterCollectionByType

private java.util.Collection<PhenotypeDTO> filterCollectionByType(java.util.Collection<PhenotypeDTO> phenotypeColl,
                                                                  java.lang.String type)
A method to filter the collection based upon the value of the "type" parameter

Parameters:
phenotypeColl -
type - - can be "evo" or "devo". This is set in the calling method
Returns:
input collection minus TTOs or GENEs depending on the value of the "type" parameter

filterTaxaFromCollection

private java.util.Collection<PhenotypeDTO> filterTaxaFromCollection(java.util.Collection<PhenotypeDTO> phenotypeColl)
A simple method that weeds out DTOs with TTOs as their taxa from the collection

Parameters:
phenotypeColl -
Returns:
input collection minus TTOs

Returns:
